QuestData.Title: Feeding the Survivors
QuestData.Description: We tuskarr rely mostly on our fish catch for sustenance. In times of great need, however, we will on occasion hunt land animals.$B$BThe nearby village of Iskaal was recently attacked by pirates and the survivors just keep pouring in.$B$BOur catch has been modest this week, but there are many shoveltusk on the island and their meat is plentiful.$B$BAid my people by hunting these great beasts and obtaining their meat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Elder Atuik at Kamagua in Howling Fjord wants you to obtain 6 pieces of Island Shoveltusk Meat from Island Shoveltusk in the Isle of Spears.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the meat we need?
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. My people are in a time of great need.
